channel.title: Making a server only Allow one certain client to login
channel.description: how can i make my server only Expect a certain Client UID so it restricts users from logging in with another client which doesn't match the same UID, Please help! I'm desperate!

item.title: Making a server only Allow one certain client to login
item.dc:creator: @12mil 12mil
item.description:
@12mil wrote:

client.java:19798: ';' expected If (UID == 123456789) { ^ client.java:19800: 'else' without 'if' } else { ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .
Help me please

Read full topic
item.source: Making a server only Allow one certain client to login

item.title: Making a server only Allow one certain client to login
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Alright, if you get a “cannot find symbol” error, it means you put it in the wrong place in client.java

Read full topic
item.source: Making a server only Allow one certain client to login

item.title: Making a server only Allow one certain client to login
item.dc:creator: @12mil 12mil
item.description:
@12mil wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:2, topic:299160”]This should work, replace the UID with your clients UID of course.

If (UID == ######) {
disconnected = false;
} else {
disconnected = true;
}

EDIT - what this does is connects the player if they are not using your client, but keep in mind this is 100% bypassable if they know what there doing.[/quote]
Thanks, let me see if it works

EDIT: I only want people to connect to my server, with a certain client, instead of using a silab client or something, Basicly i want my server client Only, and if they try to login it should say “you need to be a member to play” or “your not using the Official client! get it from www.helpmeplease.com” or even “error conencting to server” but if they are using the client i wanted them to use, it will log them in.

Read full topic
item.source: Making a server only Allow one certain client to login

item.title: Making a server only Allow one certain client to login
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

This should work, replace the UID with your clients UID of course.

If (UID == ######) {
disconnected = false;
} else {
disconnected = true;
}

EDIT - what this does is connects the player if they are not using your client, but keep in mind this is 100% bypassable if they know what there doing.

Read full topic
item.source: Making a server only Allow one certain client to login
